name.pehl.piriti.rebind
Class TypeContext

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.piriti.rebind.LogFacade
      name.pehl.piriti.rebind.TypeContext

public class TypeContext
extends LogFacade

Holds information about the reader / writer type, the type to be (de)serialized and its properties, references and id.

Version:
